com21HcxVlan.name: com21HcxVlan
com21HcxVlan.contactinfo: Network Management Postal: Paul Gordon Com21, Inc. 750 Tasman Drive Milpitas, California 95035 USA Tel: +1 408 953 9100 Fax: +1 408 953 9299 E-mail: pgordon@com21.com
com21HcxVlan.description: This is the Com21 ComController Vlan MIB module. COM21 Part# 005-0025-00

hcxVlanCtrlName.name: hcxVlanCtrlName
hcxVlanCtrlName.description: contains a descriptive name for the VLAN.

hcxVlanShelf.name: hcxVlanShelf
hcxVlanShelf.description: Specifies the Shelf to which the Vlan is attached to. Shelf/Slot/CardType/Port will uniquely identify the port to which this Vlan is attached to

hcxVlanSlot.name: hcxVlanSlot
hcxVlanSlot.description: Specifies the Slot to which the Vlan is attached to. Shelf/Slot/CardType/Port will uniquely identify the port to which this Vlan is attached to

hcxVlanCardType.name: hcxVlanCardType
hcxVlanCardType.description: Specifies the CardType to which the Vlan is attached to. Shelf/Slot/CardType/Port will uniquely identify the port to which this Vlan is attached to

hcxVlanPort.name: hcxVlanPort
hcxVlanPort.description: Specifies the Port to which the Vlan is attached to. Shelf/Slot/CardType/Port will uniquely identify the port to which this Vlan is attached to

hcxVlanPriStatus.name: hcxVlanPriStatus
hcxVlanPriStatus.description: lets the user Create a Vlan instance. If already created it lets the user Enable, Disable or Delete the Vlan. Note that the VLAN cannot be Enabled or Disabled until the attributes hcxVlanShelf, hcxVlanSlot, hcxVlanCardType and hcxVlanPort have valid values.

hcxVlanSecStatus.name: hcxVlanSecStatus
hcxVlanSecStatus.description: Indicates whether the Vlan is ONLINE or OFFLINE.

hcxVlanType.name: hcxVlanType
hcxVlanType.description: Specifies whether the Vlan is an internal Vlan or external Vlan. internal Vlan does not allow traffic to leave the Vlan or enter the Vlan. external Vlan allows traffic in both directions. default is external. Note that this attribute is not applicable to 10bT card.

hcxVlanPeerToPeerFlag.name: hcxVlanPeerToPeerFlag
hcxVlanPeerToPeerFlag.description: Specifies whether STU to STU communication is allowed in the Vlan. If false, STU to STU communication is not allowed and has to go through an external router. If true direct STU to STU communication is allowed without the intervention of an external router. This attribute is not applicable to VLANs on 10bT Card and defaults to a read-only value of true. Default for 100bT/OC3 is false.

hcxVlanMcastDnstrmRate.name: hcxVlanMcastDnstrmRate
hcxVlanMcastDnstrmRate.description: Specifies the downstream multicast rate associated with this Vlan. Defined in bits per second. The multicast rate is ondemand (not guaranteed if enough bandwidth is not available). 0 stops all broadcast forwarding. Default 100000. If a twoWay modem of model CP1000, CP1000A, CP1000B or CP1000C is acquired in the system or a teleRet modem is configured then the multicast rate will be dynamically lowered to not exceed 1000000. Under that condition an attempt to set the rate to greater than 1000000 will be rejected. The rate wil remain at 1000000 even if the condition clears eventually (all the modems of model CP1000, CP1000A, CP1000B or CP1000C get deacquired and no more teleRet modems are configured).

hcxVlanIpArpFiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanIpArpFiltEnbl
hcxVlanIpArpFiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether ARP authentication filtering should be enabled on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 10BT, 100BT, and OC3 cards. It filters traffic in the upstream direction. Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuIpArpFiltEnable.

hcxVlanIpSrcFiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanIpSrcFiltEnbl
hcxVlanIpSrcFiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether IP source address filtering should be enabled on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT, and OC3 cards. It is not applicable to 10BT card. It filters traffic in the upstream direction. Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuIpSrcFiltEnable.

hcxVlanIpDstFiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanIpDstFiltEnbl
hcxVlanIpDstFiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether IP destination address filtering should be enabled on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT, and OC3 cards. It is not applicable to to 10BT card. It filters traffic in the upstream direction. Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuIpDstFiltEnable.

hcxVlanIpBootpReqFiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanIpBootpReqFiltEnbl
hcxVlanIpBootpReqFiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether BOOTP requests, or DHCPDISCOVER, or DHCPREQUEST, or DHCPRELEASE packets should be filtered on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT, and OC3 cards. It is not applicable to 10BT card. It filters traffic in the downstream direction. Default is true. This filter cannot be controlled per ComPort.

hcxVlanIpBootpReplyFiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanIpBootpReplyFiltEnbl
hcxVlanIpBootpReplyFiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether BOOTP replies, or DHCPOFFER, or DHCPACK packets should be filtered on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT, and OC3 cards. It it not applicable to 10BT card. It filters traffic in the upstream direction. Default is true. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuIpBootpReplyFiltEnbl.

hcxVlanIpDhcpSnoopFiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanIpDhcpSnoopFiltEnbl
hcxVlanIpDhcpSnoopFiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether DHCP snooping should be enabled on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT, and OC3 cards. It is not applicable to 10BT card. It snoops traffic in the downstream direction for DHCPACK packets, and in the upstream direction for DHCPDECLINE or DHCPRELEASE packets. Dynamic IP address assigments thus learned are stored in the valid source IP address table (com21HcxStuSrcIpAddrGroup.) Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuIpDhcpSnoopFiltEnbl.

hcxVlanL2SnapFiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanL2SnapFiltEnbl
hcxVlanL2SnapFiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether SNAP-encoded IEEE 802.3 packets should be filtered on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT, and OC3 cards. It is not applicable to 10BT card. It filters traffic in both upstream and downstream directions. Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuL2SnapFiltEnbl.

hcxVlanL2NonSnapFiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanL2NonSnapFiltEnbl
hcxVlanL2NonSnapFiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether non-SNAP-encoded IEEE 802.3 packets should be filtered on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 10BT, 100BT, and OC3 cards. It filters traffic in both upstream and downstream directions. Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuL2NonSnapFiltEnbl.

hcxVlanL2EnetFiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanL2EnetFiltEnbl
hcxVlanL2EnetFiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether Ethernet packets should be filtered on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT and OC3 cards. It is not applicable to 10BT Card. It filters traffic in both upstream and downstream directions. Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuL2EnetFiltEnbl.

hcxVlanL2ArpIpv4FiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanL2ArpIpv4FiltEnbl
hcxVlanL2ArpIpv4FiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether ARP packets should be filtered on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT and OC3 cards. It is not applicable to 10BT card. It filters traffic in both upstream and downstream directions. Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuL2ArpIpv4FiltEnbl.

hcxVlanL2Ipv4FiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanL2Ipv4FiltEnbl
hcxVlanL2Ipv4FiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether IPv4 packets should be filtered on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT and OC3 cards. It is not applicable to 10BT card. It filters traffic in both upstream and downstream directions. Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuL2Ipv4FiltEnbl.

hcxVlanL2Ipv6FiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanL2Ipv6FiltEnbl
hcxVlanL2Ipv6FiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether IPv6 packets should be filtered on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT and OC3 cards. It is not applicable to 10BT card. It filters traffic in both upstream and downstream directions. Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuL2Ipv6FiltEnbl.

hcxVlanL2IpxFiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanL2IpxFiltEnbl
hcxVlanL2IpxFiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether IPX packets should be filtered on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT and OC3 cards. It is not applicable to 10BT card. It filters traffic in both upstream and downstream directions. Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuL2IpxFiltEnbl.

hcxVlanL2AppletalkFiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanL2AppletalkFiltEnbl
hcxVlanL2AppletalkFiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether AppleTalk packets should be filtered on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT and OC3 cards. It is not applicable to 10BT card. It filters traffic in both upstream and downstream directions. Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuL2AppletalkFiltEnbl.

hcxVlanL2OthersFiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanL2OthersFiltEnbl
hcxVlanL2OthersFiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether all layer 2 packets that are none of the above (ARP, IPv4, IPv6, IPX, AppleTalk) should be filtered on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT and OC3 cards. It is not applicable to 10BT card. It filters traffic in both upstream and downstream directions. Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuL2OthersFiltEnbl.

hcxVlanIpNetbiosFiltEnbl.name: hcxVlanIpNetbiosFiltEnbl
hcxVlanIpNetbiosFiltEnbl.description: Specifies whether NetBIOS-over-IP packets should be filtered on this VLAN. This filter is applicable to 100BT and OC3 cards. It is not applicable to 10BT card. It filters traffic in the upstream direction. Default is false. This filter can also be enabled for a specific ComPort via the MIB attribute hcxStuIpNetbiosFiltEnbl.

hcxVPNNum.name: hcxVPNNum
hcxVPNNum.description: Specifies the Virtual Private Network to which this Vlan belongs to. If this is not set, it defaults to 0. If a ComPort which belongs to this Vlan has to be configured to support Voice, then a VPN Number has to be defined. Default is 0.

hcxVlanVpi.name: hcxVlanVpi
hcxVlanVpi.description: Specifies the VPI to use if this vlan is on an OC3 Port. This attribute is not used if vlan is not on a oc3 Port. Default is 0.

hcxVlanVci.name: hcxVlanVci
hcxVlanVci.description: Specifies the VCI to use if this vlan is on an OC3 Port. This attribute is not used if vlan is not on a oc3 Port. If the hcxVlanVpi value is set to 0, the valid range for this attribute is 38 to 255 Default is 0.

hcxVlanRate.name: hcxVlanRate
hcxVlanRate.description: Specifies the Maximum Rate at which this Vlan can operate. This attribute is used only if the vlan is on an OC3 Port. Default is 10,000,000 bps

hcxVlanStatsId.name: hcxVlanStatsId
hcxVlanStatsId.description: Is used as an Index to read the Statistics of a given Vlan.

hcxVlanCurrMcastTxPkts.name: hcxVlanCurrMcastTxPkts
hcxVlanCurrMcastTxPkts.description: contains the number of Multicast net packets sent downstream over the Vlan in the current 15min period.

hcxVlanCurrMcastDroppedPkts.name: hcxVlanCurrMcastDroppedPkts
hcxVlanCurrMcastDroppedPkts.description: contains the number of Multicast downstream packets dropped in the current 15min period.

hcxVlanIpCurrArpFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpCurrArpFiltStat
hcxVlanIpCurrArpFiltStat.description: contains the number of ARP packets from this Vlan dropped due to authentication filtering in the current 15minute collection period

hcxVlanIpCurrSrcFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpCurrSrcFiltStat
hcxVlanIpCurrSrcFiltStat.description: Contains the number of IP packets from this VLAN dropped due to source address filtering in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanIpCurrDstFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpCurrDstFiltStat
hcxVlanIpCurrDstFiltStat.description: Contains the number of IP packets from this VLAN dropped due to destination address filtering in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanIpCurrBootpReqFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpCurrBootpReqFiltStat
hcxVlanIpCurrBootpReqFiltStat.description: Contains the number of Bootp Req packets from this VLAN dropped due to filtering in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanIpCurrBootpReplyFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpCurrBootpReplyFiltStat
hcxVlanIpCurrBootpReplyFiltStat.description: Contains the number of Bootp Reply packets from this VLAN dropped due to filtering in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanIpCurrDhcpSnoopFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpCurrDhcpSnoopFiltStat
hcxVlanIpCurrDhcpSnoopFiltStat.description: Contains the number of DHCP Ack packets from this VLAN snooped due to filtering in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanPrevMcastTxPkts.name: hcxVlanPrevMcastTxPkts
hcxVlanPrevMcastTxPkts.description: contains the number of Multicast net packets sent downstream over the Vlan in the previous 15min period.

hcxVlanPrevMcastDroppedPkts.name: hcxVlanPrevMcastDroppedPkts
hcxVlanPrevMcastDroppedPkts.description: contains the number of Multicast downstream packets dropped in the previous 15min period.

hcxVlanIpPrevArpFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpPrevArpFiltStat
hcxVlanIpPrevArpFiltStat.description: contains the number of ARP packets from this Vlan dropped due to authentication filtering in the previous 15minute collection period

hcxVlanIpPrevSrcFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpPrevSrcFiltStat
hcxVlanIpPrevSrcFiltStat.description: Contains the number of IP packets from this VLAN dropped due to source address filtering in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanIpPrevDstFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpPrevDstFiltStat
hcxVlanIpPrevDstFiltStat.description: Contains the number of IP packets from this VLAN dropped due to destination address filtering in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanIpPrevBootpReqFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpPrevBootpReqFiltStat
hcxVlanIpPrevBootpReqFiltStat.description: Contains the number of Bootp Req packets from this VLAN dropped due to filtering in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanIpPrevBootpReplyFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpPrevBootpReplyFiltStat
hcxVlanIpPrevBootpReplyFiltStat.description: Contains the number of Bootp Reply packets from this VLAN dropped due to filtering in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanIpPrevDhcpSnoopFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpPrevDhcpSnoopFiltStat
hcxVlanIpPrevDhcpSnoopFiltStat.description: Contains the number of DHCP Ack packets from this VLAN snooped due to filtering in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanClearStats.name: hcxVlanClearStats
hcxVlanClearStats.description: This attribute is used to clear the all VLAN statistics counters in this group. This operation is only possible if the hcxStatsControl attribute is set to wrapCurr.

hcxVlanL2CurrSnapFiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2CurrSnapFiltStat
hcxVlanL2CurrSnapFiltStat.description: Contains the number of SNAP-encoded IEEE 802.3 packets filtered from this VLAN in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2CurrNonSnapFiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2CurrNonSnapFiltStat
hcxVlanL2CurrNonSnapFiltStat.description: Contains the number of non-SNAP-encoded IEEE 802.3 packets filtered from this VLAN in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2CurrEnetFiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2CurrEnetFiltStat
hcxVlanL2CurrEnetFiltStat.description: Contains the number of Ethernet packets filtered from this VLAN in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2CurrArpIpv4FiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2CurrArpIpv4FiltStat
hcxVlanL2CurrArpIpv4FiltStat.description: Contains the number of IPv4 ARP packets filtered from this VLAN in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2CurrIpv4FiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2CurrIpv4FiltStat
hcxVlanL2CurrIpv4FiltStat.description: Contains the number of IPv4 packets filtered from this VLAN in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2CurrIpv6FiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2CurrIpv6FiltStat
hcxVlanL2CurrIpv6FiltStat.description: Contains the number of IPv6 packets filtered from this VLAN in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2CurrIpxFiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2CurrIpxFiltStat
hcxVlanL2CurrIpxFiltStat.description: Contains the number of IPX packets filtered from this VLAN in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2CurrAppletalkFiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2CurrAppletalkFiltStat
hcxVlanL2CurrAppletalkFiltStat.description: Contains the number of AppleTalk packets filtered from this VLAN in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2CurrOthersFiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2CurrOthersFiltStat
hcxVlanL2CurrOthersFiltStat.description: Contains the number of packets that are none of the above type of filters that are filtered from this VLAN in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanIpCurrNetbiosFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpCurrNetbiosFiltStat
hcxVlanIpCurrNetbiosFiltStat.description: Contains the number of NetBIOS-over-IP packets that are filtered from this VLAN in the current 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2PrevSnapFiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2PrevSnapFiltStat
hcxVlanL2PrevSnapFiltStat.description: Contains the number of SNAP-encoded IEEE 802.3 packets filtered from this VLAN in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2PrevNonSnapFiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2PrevNonSnapFiltStat
hcxVlanL2PrevNonSnapFiltStat.description: Contains the number of non-SNAP-encoded IEEE 802.3 packets filtered from this VLAN in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2PrevEnetFiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2PrevEnetFiltStat
hcxVlanL2PrevEnetFiltStat.description: Contains the number of Ethernet packets filtered from this VLAN in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2PrevArpIpv4FiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2PrevArpIpv4FiltStat
hcxVlanL2PrevArpIpv4FiltStat.description: Contains the number of IPv4 ARP packets filtered from this VLAN in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2PrevIpv4FiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2PrevIpv4FiltStat
hcxVlanL2PrevIpv4FiltStat.description: Contains the number of IPv4 packets filtered from this VLAN in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2PrevIpv6FiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2PrevIpv6FiltStat
hcxVlanL2PrevIpv6FiltStat.description: Contains the number of IPv6 packets filtered from this VLAN in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2PrevIpxFiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2PrevIpxFiltStat
hcxVlanL2PrevIpxFiltStat.description: Contains the number of IPX packets filtered from this VLAN in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2PrevAppletalkFiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2PrevAppletalkFiltStat
hcxVlanL2PrevAppletalkFiltStat.description: Contains the number of AppleTalk packets filtered from this VLAN in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanL2PrevOthersFiltStat.name: hcxVlanL2PrevOthersFiltStat
hcxVlanL2PrevOthersFiltStat.description: Contains the number of packets that are none of the above type of filters that are filtered from this VLAN in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxVlanIpPrevNetbiosFiltStat.name: hcxVlanIpPrevNetbiosFiltStat
hcxVlanIpPrevNetbiosFiltStat.description: Contains the number of NetBIOS-over-IP packets that are filtered from this VLAN in the previous 15 minute collection period.

hcxOc3VlanStatsVlanId.name: hcxOc3VlanStatsVlanId
hcxOc3VlanStatsVlanId.description: Specifies the index into this table. An entry exists for each vlan which is on the Oc3 Port.

hcxOc3VlanStatsCurrTxPkts.name: hcxOc3VlanStatsCurrTxPkts
hcxOc3VlanStatsCurrTxPkts.description: Specifies the number of Pkts. Transmitted on the VPI/VCI value associated with this entry in the current 15-min time period.

hcxOc3VlanStatsCurrRxPkts.name: hcxOc3VlanStatsCurrRxPkts
hcxOc3VlanStatsCurrRxPkts.description: Specifies the number of Pkts. Received on the VPI/VCI value associated with this entry in the current 15-min time period.

hcxOc3VlanStatsCurrCrcPkts.name: hcxOc3VlanStatsCurrCrcPkts
hcxOc3VlanStatsCurrCrcPkts.description: Specifies the number of Pkts. Received with CRC error on the VPI/VCI value associated with this entry in the current 15-min time period.

hcxOc3VlanStatsPrevTxPkts.name: hcxOc3VlanStatsPrevTxPkts
hcxOc3VlanStatsPrevTxPkts.description: Specifies the number of Pkts. Transmitted on the VPI/VCI value associated with this entry in the previous 15-min time period.

hcxOc3VlanStatsPrevRxPkts.name: hcxOc3VlanStatsPrevRxPkts
hcxOc3VlanStatsPrevRxPkts.description: Specifies the number of Pkts. Received on the VPI/VCI value associated with this entry in the previous 15-min time period.

hcxOc3VlanStatsPrevCrcPkts.name: hcxOc3VlanStatsPrevCrcPkts
hcxOc3VlanStatsPrevCrcPkts.description: Specifies the number of Pkts. Received with CRC error on the VPI/VCI value associated with this entry in the previous 15-min time period.

hcxOc3VlanStatsClear.name: hcxOc3VlanStatsClear
hcxOc3VlanStatsClear.description: Provides the capability to clear the statistics. Clearing of Statistics is allowed only if hcxStatsControl attribute is set to wrapCurr.
